activities: From time to time, Pangea3’s U.S. operations may receive personal information of EU/EEA/Swiss residents. The personal information at issue is controlled by Pangea3’s clients, who may send documents containing such personal information to Pangea3’s facilities in the U.S.  Pangea3’s attorneys then conduct document review as part of the discovery process in litigation or investigative review, or provide contract lifecycle support services such as drafting and abstraction or other legal support services as may be requested.  The type of data would depend upon the subject of the document review or contract type, as well as the client’s industry.
contactoff1: 102 B, Leela Business Park, Andheri Kurla Road, Andheri Mumbai, India
contacttitle1: Associate Director, Business Continuity and Information Security Assurance
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Online, Offline and/or Manually Processed personal information supplied by Pangea3’s clients.
recoursemech: EU and/or Swiss Data Protection Authorities
